cmp: 召 ((surname)/name of an ancient state, to call together/to summon/to convene)

exm.mng: Diaochan (-192), one of the Four legendary beauties 四大美女[si4 da4 mei3 nu:3], in fiction a famous beauty at the break-up of Han dynasty, given as concubine to usurping warlord Dong Zhuo 董卓[Dong3 Zhuo2] to ensure his overthrow by fighting hero Lü Bu 呂布|吕布[Lu:3 Bu4]
Cape San Diego or Santiao, easternmost point of Taiwan Island
lit. to trade a fur coat for wine (idiom), fig. (of wealthy people) to lead a dissolute and extravagant life
lit. to use a dog's tail as a substitute for sable fur (idiom), fig. a worthless sequel to a masterpiece
